document.full_text: nasdaq's late-night announcement to adjust weightings in the benchmark nasdaq 100 index spurred volatility in apple shares and surprised u.s. fund managers, who questioned the timing of the news.
document.title: nasdaq index rebalancing slashes apple's influence
lines_and_colors: nasdaq's late-night announcement to adjust weightings in the benchmark nasdaq 100 index spurred volatility in apple shares and surprised u.s. fund managers, who questioned the timing of the news.
